entry.title: Rambus Presents First GDDR7 Memory Controller in the Age of AI 2.0

link.title: Rambus Presents First GDDR7 Memory Controller in the Age of AI 2.0

entry.summary: Today's processors support large-language models scaling to over a trillion parameters. Rambus is keeping up with this computational load with a new memory solution.

entry.title: Three Software Companies Show Off Support Tools at Embedded World

entry.summary: Embedded World was rife with major hardware releases. Here are a few unique software packages designed to simplify the development experience.

entry.summary: Infineon designed its newest MCU family to build developers' trust in AI models.

entry.title: Micron to ‘Revolutionize’ Smart Vehicles With First Quad-Port SSD

link.title: Micron to ‘Revolutionize’ Smart Vehicles With First Quad-Port SSD

entry.summary: Micron simplifies data access in new vehicle architectures with its first multi-port automotive SSD.

entry.title: Arm Shows Off New NPU and IoT Reference Design at Embedded World

entry.summary: Drilling down on the edge AI focus at Embedded World 2024, Arm announced some significant updates to its computing portfolio.
